title: T.B.M.D Arieanna's Legend
description: Teaching Between Midnight & Dawn SeriesBook 1Arieanna was pretty much happy with her life. Her students loved her, she adored teaching; life was simple and uncomplicated. That is until she met Auron. Sent by an exclusive underground sect, Auron's there to protect the descendant of Ast at all cost. His number one purpose is to keep the supposed volume of Ast's magick from entering the hands of the wrong people, in spite of the fact that it might cause his death.Exiled two centuries ago from his Foretag for insubordination and murder, Auron knows if Jimmy Mann gets his hands on that book all hell will break lose....
author: Alexandria Infante
